legal_basis: Canadian Charter of Rights and Freedoms, s. 7
Crown Liability and Proceedings Act, s. 22
cause_of_action: refusal to grant leave of absence or voluntary release
relevant_statute: Canadian Charter of Rights and Freedoms
application_details: plaintiff signed an agreement obligating him to serve in exchange for funding
changes in medical licensing requirements justify his request for leave
decision_reasoning: no contractual or legal obligation to release him
conclusion_outcome: application for an injunction or stay is dismissed
result_of_case: ruling that the plaintiff's claim did not meet the criteria for injunctive relief or establish a violation of s. 7 rights
